ComicInfo.Summary:
Mr. Baby—a bizarre looking, dangerous man—is the sole survivor of Berlin’s prewar nightlife. Play by his rules, and he can get you anything, but he’s not one to be crossed. A hard lesson for our inter-dimensional pilot… and the corrupt officials from his world who want him dead.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tula Lotay | 1 | Sub-A | Subscription Cover A | Butch Guice (a) & Diego Rodriguez (c) | 2 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | James Biggie | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 23:27:34. [CVDB552077]
ComicInfo.Inker: Jackson Butch Guice, Jackson Butch Guice, Tom Palmer
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Diego Rodriguez, James Biggie, Tula Lotay
